wikipedia_page.main: William Sutton VC (1830 – 16 February 1888) was an English recipient of the Victoria Cross, the highest and most prestigious award for gallantry in the face of the enemy that can be awarded to British and Commonwealth forces.

response: *William Sutton (1830 – 1888), recipient of the Victoria Cross
